sense.def:
To curse
pomeni psovati ali govoriti grde besede, ker smo zaradi nečesa jezni.

seg.quote: He missed the ball and cursed violently.
With a curse he disentangled his head from the netting.

sense.def:
To curse someone
pomeni nekomu govoriti žaljive besede, ker smo jezni nanj.

seg.quote: I was cursing him under my breath for his carelessness.

sense.def:
To curse something
pomeni jezno se pritoževati nad čim, največkrat v prostaškem jeziku.

seg.quote: Cursing my plight, I tried to find shelter for the night.

sense.def:
Če rečemo
there is a curse on someone
, hočemo povedati, da neka nadnaravna sila povzroča, da se nekomu dogajajo neprijetne stvari.

seg.quote: There is a curse on this family.

sense.def:
Tudi tisto, kar povzroča veliko težav ali nezadovoljstva, lahko imenujemo
a curse
.

seg.quote: Loneliness in old age is the curse of modern society.
